description: I've tried about 5 different digital audio workstations on Linux, Windows and Mac and ardour is not only my favourite open source DAW, but my favourite overall. There is a small learning curve, but I got used to the software in nearly no time at all. Organising and categorising tracks is easy and The mixing capabilities are head and shoulders above the rest. If you are looking for an open source DAW that can match or even outperform closed source ones, You've arrived.
Instalé audacity en mi Pc con fedora y no se escuchaba nada, me cansé de buscar alternativas, y veo que en esta si funciona perfectamente
summary: Me cambie a esta aplicación , está mejor que audacity

description: ubuntu上用的不错，到fedora上就不好用了，无法创建项目
